label: 譜代大名
本: Osaka: The Merchants' Capital of Early Modern Japan . Cornell University Press . 1999
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
説明文: A daimyo who was elevated to that status by the Tokugawa family or who, as an independent lord, allied himself with Ieyasu before the Battle of Sekigahara in 1600. [徳川、家康、関ヶ原]
